name: Football Kicks Penalty Shootouts World Edition - Real Soccer Game
name_original: Football Kicks Penalty Shootouts World Edition - Real Soccer Game
description:
Follow your dreams and replay the most engaging moments in football matches - penalty shoots.

Enjoy the tense moments of the penalty shots as if you were playing in the final, competing against the best teams, making the most spectacular goals and saves and along with graphics that will make you feel as if you were sitting in the first row in Maracan„ Stadium. Perfect your special shots, shoot with special effects, fool your opponent and make the most impressive saves, controlling the ball with one finger, and become the Brazil 2014 Champion.

Football Kicks Penalty Shoots is a simple yet addictive 3D football game! Football Kicks is a must-have for any Soccer fan! Practice your free-kick skills on iOS.

For those dreaming of playing for Barsa or Madrid... Free Football Kicks Penalty Shoots is now available!
Feel the excitement of football trying to beat the goalkeeper. Throw a ball effect or not surprised it...
With Free Football Kicks You can ensallar free-throws live to become a master of football.

--------------------
How to Play:
--------------------

- Flick the ball to kick it out
- Swipe to adjust the direction of the ball while it is in the air

-------------------------
Game Features:
-------------------------

- 3 epiodes with 18 awesome levels in each.
- Top 10 league club teams players to choose from.
- Smoother and more realistic and optimized graphics for both players and perfect football stadiums.
- cool 3d sounds.
- Real football Flick kicks game contains realistic kick, goal keeper and pass animations.
- Smooth animations with 60 frames per second
- Simple yet powerful touch controls with timing control.
- Compete with your friends with the integrated world ranking leaderboard
 - Pure soccer action!

--------------------
Be Social :)
--------------------

To keep yourself update about new features and games join our social pages.
 - https://www.facebook.com/footccer
 - https://twitter.com/footccer

----------------
Feedback:
----------------

If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at techmowo@gmail.com. In case something is not working correctly please let us know, I'll be glad to fix that.
Please post comments and feedback. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.
